head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WRYNN, STEPHEN A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WRYNN, STEPHEN A.

block.p: WRYNN-Stephen A., 57. Of New York and Red Hook, NY, Tuesday, August 4, 1998. Husband of Monica S. Wieboldt, father of Daniel and Dylan, son of James & Kathryn, brother of Susan and James. A Memorial service will be held at 10am Saturday, August 15 at Christ Church, Red Hook. Memorials may be made to Hospice, Inc 70 S. Hamilton St, Poughkeepsie, NY 12601. For information call Burnett, Rockefeller & Hand Funeral Home, Red Hook 914-758-5042.
